author: shree neupane
text:
Lessons of Life : Just a few weeks ago wealth was measured by what you own. How much you owned. 

Suddenly the world has changed. Now wealth will be measured by your ability to breathe. Breathe fresh air fearlessly, and without a mask. Whenever that happens. 

#COVID__19

author: shree neupane
text:
Think lightly of yourself and deeply of the world. 
— Miyamoto Musashi

author: shree neupane
text:
"Nonreaction to the ego in others is one of the most effective ways not only of going beyond ego in yourself but also of dissolving the collective human ego."
      — Eckhart Tolle

author: shree neupane
text: Lessons of Life : Excitement and fear for your new project  often go together. Don’t allow the fear to  create blocks that stop you from achieving its potential.

author: shree neupane
text:
We should learn to appreciate what we have,
before time makes us appreciate what we had. "

author: shree neupane
text: Lessons of Life : Daydreaming is an essential part of being creative.

text: 9/11 An Inside Job? Well This New Video Proves It Right ▶ https://t.co/rrIIE9d4an

author: shree neupane
text: That man who by the study of these maxims from the satras acquires a knowledge of the most celebrated principles of duty, and understands what ought and what ought not to be followed, and what is good and what is bad, is most excellent.

author: shree neupane
text: Don’t waste your precious life force being stuck on what didn’t work out or what you could’ve done. Do something new today. Each moment is another chance to recreate yourself.

author: shree neupane
text: Lessons of Life : All those people, those naysayers sitting inside your head. They are really your own negative thoughts you have given identity to.

author: shree neupane
text:
Lessons of Life : Like invisible chains you drag your past with you, unable to let go. Memories themselves become addictions.

Memories themselves are not true friends. Each memory is a selective snapshot altered by ur perception of your present. To move forward, let the past go.

author: shree neupane
text:
"The strongest people are not
those who show strength in front of us but those
who win battles we know nothing about.

author: shree neupane
text: Lessons of Life : If you look for an enemy in someone’s eyes, you’ll find one. But if you look for a friend in those very eyes, you’ll find a friend. Whats your perspective, compassionate or prejudiced? That creates the relationship.

author: shree neupane
text:
The two nicest places to be in the world are:

Someone’s thoughts,

Someone’s prayers !

author: shree neupane
text: Lessons of Life : There is no greater block to you achieving your dreams than your own mind.

author: shree neupane
text: Lessons of Life : There is no greater noise than the screaming inside your own head.

author: shree neupane
text: Lessons of Life : When the winds of change blow, its the tree with the strongest roots that bends and adapts, or the tree will break and fall down. How strong your roots are, will define how you adapt to change #MondayMotivation

author: shree neupane
text: Lessons of Life : How passionate are you about what you desire to do? The more passionate you are, the more the universe will test your resolve. Stay resolute. Finally the Universe will give in and become your partner in your passion. So, how passionate are you ?

author: shree neupane
text: Lessons of Life : If you want to succeed steer your ship into the toughest and toughest seas. Where each wave threatens to challenge your passion and your spirit.  Make you more alive.

author: shree neupane
text: People with good intentions make promises, but people with good character keep them

author: shree neupane
text:
" Physical strength is measured by what we can
carry. Inner strength is measured by what we can
bear. "

author: shree neupane
text:
Arriving late is the way of saying that our own
time is more valuable than the time of the person
who waited for us. "

author: shree neupane
text:
Sometimes we are tested not to show
our weakness, but to discover our strength. "

author: shree neupane
text:
Never be ashamed of your weaknesses,
cause they are not,they are just attributes
that make you special,don't try to change
in the quest of seeking perfection,your
scars and faults are what makes you
beautiful and unique.

author: shree neupane
text:
" Never go out of way to explain
someone your Honesty and his Fault. Time has its
own way of revealing the Truth"

author: shree neupane
text:
" Difference between amiri and raeesi.
The rich have money.
The wealthy have time."

text:

text:

shoes, but also uses the same number of chairs to
sit on , he does not just be a Son, but the dearest
friend !!

text:

will immediately open door to solutions instead of
arguments."~

author: shree neupane
text:
Before we assume, learn the facts. Before
we judge, understand why. Before we hurt
someone, feel. Before we speak, think.'

author: shree neupane
text:
Sometimes you have to distance yourself
from people. If they care, they will notice.
If they don't, you will know where you
stand.

author: shree neupane
text:
There was never a genius without a
tincture of madness.

text:

sometimes drags on more than you
thought, especially when your Plan A
didn’t work out,”

author: shree neupane
text:
' Its funny how nobody notices what
we do until we don't do it. "

author: shree neupane
text: Lessons of Life : Your dreams are not reasonable. Those that changed the world dreamt, thought and acted unreasonably.

author: shree neupane
text:
Two conditions : you can be stupid ;
you can be surrounded by stupidity .. but when
you are stupid AND surrounded by stupidity, its
an unfathomable disaster !

author: shree neupane
text:
"To be old and wise, one must first have
to be young and stupid"

author: shree neupane
text:
When young .. too shy, uncertain, self
conscious, scared to ask questions ! When old , its
already to late to ask ..

author: shree neupane
text:
Problem doesn't just show up in our
lives for no reason. It's a sign that something in
our lives needs to change.

author: shree neupane
text:
‘It's not in destiny nor it's fate, happiness is
something which we create ‘
